nodes.text: Ruceba Ahid was a male Human smuggler who, along with his accomplices, Stu Hemphawar and Oejoe Hitewa, worked out of a tiny apartment close to the Entertainment District of Coruscant. Active during the years prior to the Battle of Naboo, the Senate Bureau of Intelligence issued a bounty for their arrest, when the group was implicated in trafficking illicit material throughout the Core Worlds. In 32 BBY, the entire group was eventually hunted down and captured by the bounty hunter Jango Fett.
